collection_filters.name: Collection Filters
collection_filters.paragraph: Control which collection types display product filters (color, themes, tags, etc.)

settings.paragraph: The cart and checkout prices always display currency codes. Example: 1 EUR.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be resized to 32 x 32 px

predictive_search_show_vendor.label: Show vendor
predictive_search_show_vendor.info: Visible when product suggestions are enabled.

predictive_search_show_price.label: Show price
predictive_search_show_price.info: Visible when product suggestions are enabled.

type_header_font_custom.label: Custom font
type_header_font_custom.info: If selected, the font below will not be applied in favor of the custom font

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font may affect your store’s speed. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font may affect your store’s speed. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

nb_columns_on_computer.label: Number of columns per row on desktop

nb_columns_on_mobile.label: Number of columns per row on mobile

current_page_color.info: Visible on desktop only, marks the current page

heading.info: Include a title that explains the content.
heading.label: Title

lazy_load.label: Lazy load image
lazy_load.info: Image will only load when visible. Uncheck if image is visible on page load.

input_textarea.label: Message field
input_textarea.info: Text shown before user types their message

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code for advanced customizations.

paragraph.content: Each email signup creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

show_text_below.label: Show content below image on mobile
show_text_below.info: For best results, use a 16:9 aspect ratio image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use a 16:9 aspect ratio image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

post_limit.label: Number of blog posts to show

show_view_all.label: Enable 'View all' button if blog has more posts

show_image.label: Show featured images
show_image.info: For best results, use a 3:2 aspect ratio image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Only top-level menu items are shown.

color_above_border.label: Above border color
color_above_border.info: Only visible if wavy border is enabled

header__1.info: Subscribers are automatically added to your 'accepts marketing' customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To show your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages)

default_desktop_image_1.label: Default desktop image 1 (top-left)
default_desktop_image_1.info: Only visible on desktop. Grid of 4 images shown when nothing is hovered.

desktop_image_1.label: Desktop image 1 (top-left)
desktop_image_1.info: Only visible on desktop. Grid of 4 images.

desktop_image.label: Image illustrating the set of collections
Image illustrating the product
desktop_image.info: Only visible on desktop. Falls back to product's featured image if not set.

enable_lazy_loading.label: Enable lazy loading
enable_lazy_loading.info: Image loads only when visible. Uncheck if image appears first on page.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: Image always appears above text on mobile

show_collapse_button.label: Read more button
show_collapse_button.info: Allows the user to choose whether to view the full collection content

to_place_first.label: Place last
to_place_first.info: Visible at the bottom of the page even if not placed there in the theme. Useful for SEO optimization without affecting user experience

primary_image_index.label: Primary image number
primary_image_index.info: Enter which image to show (1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)

next_image_index.label: Hover image number
next_image_index.info: Enter which image to show on hover (0 to disable hover effect, 1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)

is_dynamic_variant.label: Display variant name
is_dynamic_variant.info: If enabled, the variant name will take precedence over the text

promotion_date.label: Promotion end date
promotion_date.info: Visible only if the product is on promotion

promotion_discount.label: Promotion discount
promotion_discount.info: If empty, the discount is calculated on the price before reduction filled from the product sheet

promotion_reason.label: Promotion reason
promotion_reason.info: Visible only if the product is on promotion

show_promotion.label: Show promotion
show_promotion.info: Visible only if the product is on promotion

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

trustpilot_score.label: Trustpilot Score
trustpilot_score.info: Rated out of 50. For a 4.3 out of 5 score, enter 43

primary_image_index.label: Primary image number
primary_image_index.info: Enter which image to show (1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)

next_image_index.label: Hover image number
next_image_index.info: Enter which image to show on hover (0 to disable hover effect, 1 for first, 2 for second, etc.)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To show a rating, add a product review app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#search-results-section-settings)

button_label.label: Button text
button_label.info: Leave empty to hide the button

full.content: When the list is not empty

empty_text.label: Text
empty_text.info: Displayed when no product is liked

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

button_label_1.label: First button text
button_label_1.info: Leave the text empty to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button text
button_label_2.info: Leave the text empty to hide the button.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL
video_url.info: The video plays on the page.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

image_padding.label: Add padding to image
image_padding.info: Select padding to avoid your cover image being cropped.

image.label: Image
image.info: Image displayed until the video loads
